thread.title: Upgraded SOLE F65 Treadmill Comes With Backlit LCD Display & 15 Incline Levels
thread.title_full: Upgraded SOLE F65 Treadmill Comes With Backlit LCD Display & 15 Incline Levels

author: SOLE Fitness
title: Upgraded SOLE F65 Treadmill Comes With Backlit LCD Display & 15 Incline Levels
text: Leading fitness manufacturer SOLE Fitness offers their enhanced SOLE F65, a heavy-duty treadmill that builds on the success of the popular F63 model. It's new and improved but still affordable. (firmenpresse) - By this time of the year, many of us are struggling to hold on to those New Year's resolutions we made just a few months ago. We wanted to look better, feel better, be better. And so, with the best of intentions, we set a goal to work out more. But then, somehow, March arrived and our resolutions flew out the window. But it's not too late to recommit, especially with the latest treadmill update from SOLE Fitness! Check out the upgraded SOLE F65 treadmill at https://www.soletreadmills.com/products/sole-f65 The F65 is the latest addition to SOLE’s line of premiere treadmills. Engineered with a user-friendly console and spacious running surface, the SOLE F65 offers enhanced features to improve performance while maintaining affordability. Customize Your Workout Upon purchasing the SOLE F65, you'll get access to the SOLE+ app with over 3,000 pre-recorded workouts for all skill levels. The workouts range from 10 to 60 minutes to accommodate any routine. And the best part? It's totally free! The app also uses various metrics such as heart rate to help you customize your workout experience. On the F65, you can reach speeds of up to 12 mph and select from a range of 15 incline levels. The customization possibilities are endless; you'll reach your fitness goals in record time. Additional Features The SOLE F65 also features cooling fans and an integrated tablet holder, so you can connect to your favorite workout routines or entertainment while exercising. With a USB port for charging devices and Bluetooth speakers for streaming music, the SOLE F65’s technology integration is truly seamless. Further, its 9-inch backlit LCD display showcases metrics such as speed, incline, time, distance traveled, calories, pulse, and pace. You can also toggle to a peak and valley graph to display and track important workout data. Shipping & Warranties The SOLE F65 ships free and is backed by a lifetime warranty for its frame and motor, along with a 2-year warranty for its deck and various components. You can keep your New Year's resolution this year and for years to come! Fitness Equipment With Exceptional Quality SOLE Fitness has been a leading manufacturer of quality fitness equipment for decades. Recognized with various awards such as Best Overall Treadmill and Best Customer Service, the company is expanding its presence globally. Their engineering and design team considers both customer feedback and the current fitness market when building fitness equipment that is both efficient and affordable. A satisfied customer said, “This is a great treadmill. I've owned this for approximately one year. It is a quality product. I have a Sole elliptical E95 and decided on this brand due to the durability of the elliptical. I have this in my main living room; I like that it folds up in the event I need space. I use it 3-4 times a week. My husband is 6'2 and weighs 250 lbs. He also uses both machines. I definitely recommend.” Find out more at https://www.soletreadmills.com/products/sole-f65 Themen in dieser Pressemitteilung: Unternehmensinformation / Kurzprofil: SOLE Fitness SOLE Fitness https://www.soletreadmills.com/ info(at)soletreadmills.com 56 Exchange Pl. Salt Lake City United States Datum: 04.04.2024 - 23:00 Uhr Sprache: Deutsch News-ID 703213 Anzahl Zeichen: 3307 contact information: Contact person: Inquiries Town: Salt Lake City Kategorie: Typ of Press Release: Unternehmensinformation type of sending: Veröffentlichung Date of sending: 04/04/2024 Diese Pressemitteilung wurde bisher 12 mal aufgerufen.
